attributes.action: Re-open the former Picton-Battersby line in North Yorkshire...
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
to create a link from the Esk Valley line from Whitby, to Northallerton and south to York, by-passing Middlesbrough, and enabling more Trains to / from Whitby than the current 4 a day as it increases in popularity with tourists, and also enable an increased number of train services to Middlesbrough from the south at the same time.
(further details on the old route can be found on Wikipedia, which the link to wasn't allowed on me original attempt to post this petition)
